sourcesContent:
<template>
  <textarea :value="modelValue" @input="updateInput" class="textarea" name="" id=""></textarea>

  <textarea v-model="textValue" @input="handleInput"></textarea>
</template>

<script>
export default {
 name: 'my-textarea',
 props: {
    value: {
      type: String,
      required: true,
    },
 },
 methods: {
  updateInput(event) {
    this.$emit('update:modelValue', event.target.value)
    // this.$emit('update:other', event.target.value)
  }
 }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

.input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 16px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin: 16px 0;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  display: block;
}
</style>
